byline.contributor: Patrick Zuo and Kiki Zhao contributed research.

abstract: Greenpeace reports Chinese-owned or Chinese-flagged fishing vessels are threatening marine resources in West African waters; allegations follow two-year observation of hundreds of Chinese-owned or flagged boats off coasts of half a dozen West African nations.
lead_paragraph: A study by the group accuses hundreds of Chinese-owned or Chinese-flagged vessels of taking advantage of weak enforcement by African governments.

headline.main: Chinese Fleets Illegally Fish in West African Waters, Greenpeace Says
headline.print_headline: Greenpeace Accuses Chinese of Illegal Fishing Off Africa

snippet: A study by the group accuses hundreds of Chinese-owned or Chinese-flagged vessels of taking advantage of weak enforcement by African governments.
